title: President felicitates newly elected PFUJ office bearers
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 23 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Saturday felicitated the newly elected office bearers of the Pakistan Federal Union of Journalists (PFUJ).
The president congratulated Afzal Butt and Arshad Ansari on their election as PFUJ president and general secretary respectively.
The president also extended his felicitation to other elected office bearers of the body.
The president underlined that the government and the representative bodies of media should work together for the protection of the rights of journalists and the resolution of their issues.
He also expressed the hope that the newly elected office bearers of PFUJ would play their active role for the promotion of journalistic values.
